 * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mock_object Mocking conception]
  * [http://www.jmock.org/oopsla2004.pdf Steve Freeman, Nat Pryce, Tim Mackinnon, Joe Walnes: Mock Roles, not Objects]
  * [http://martinfowler.com/articles/mocksArentStubs.html Martin Fowler: Mocks Aren't Stubs]

  * [http://www.hippomocks.com/wiki/index.php/Special:AllPages wiki tutorial]

  * [https://github.com/bigeasy/hippomocks actual sources]
